example.text: Their first actions were a poor start, gutting the congressional ethics watchdog and passing messaging bills to make it easier for wealthy Americans to cheat on their taxes and restrict women's access to healthcare . If they continue in this manner, then I will continue to fight back.

Additionally, I've worked across the aisle to build support for the Russian oil price-cap and will continue to work on bipartisan backing for Ukraine. Our support for Ukraine is sending a message to Moscow, it's sending a message to Beijing, and it's sending a message to other authoritarian regimes: the United States is committed to defending the principles of democracy and freedom across the globe.
These funds will help de-lead Fall River's drinking water and purchase electric school buses. As I said in my remarks to Fall River students: this is government at work, for you.

Their current plan, a special-interest buffet which will not pass in the Democratic-controlled Senate, is more of the same. Just like they did under Bush and Trump, Republicans want to increase the deficit and help the rich.
The Taunton Diversity Network works for community-based solutions to gun safety and domestic violence. I look forward to sharing our important conversation. #CommunityConvos [[url]]
The 2023 National Defense Authorization Act passed the House last week. I was the only Democratic veteran to vote against it.

The bill currently totals $857 billion, representing an $80 billion increase over the previous year. I am a proud supporter of a strong and growing US military, but the spending needs to be reined in.
